heading: High speed. High quality.
bio: With 7 years in the game, I've learned that great software isn't just about clean code (though I'm obsessed with that). It's about building solutions that people actually enjoy using.

My background in Graphic Design and Content Writing allows me to speak the language of design and marketing teams fluently. I don't just 'receive tickets'; I contribute to the product vision, ensuring every pixel and every line of code serves the end-user.

philosophyItems.title: Clean Architecture
philosophyItems.description: Scalable structures that developers love to maintain.

philosophyItems.title: User-Centric Performance
philosophyItems.description: Speed is a feature, not an afterthought.
